rules_text:
Spirited
{3}, {T}: Reveal the top three cards of your library. You may put a creature card with mana value 2 from among them onto the battlefield. It can't block this turn. Put the rest on the bottom in any order.
special_text:
First mate–Your starting deck contains at least ten creatures cards with mana value 2 and different names. [i](If this card outside the game is your chosen first mate, you may swap it with a card in your opening hand.)[/i]
